HHS on GitHub

About Issues

US Department of
Health and Human Services (HHS)

This site is primarily a landing page to direct visitors to HHS-related GitHub accounts, repositories and pages that are maintained under various names by HHS operating divisions, and staff offices. HHS, as an umbrella organization, has its own GitHub organizational account that hosts repos, and a GitHub.io page.

HHS protects health and provides essential human services. HHS has 11 operating divisions, including 8 agencies in the US Public Health Service and 3 human services agencies that administer a wide variety of health and human services and conduct life-saving research for the nation. HHS has 17 staff offices that oversee operations and provide guidance on policy issues and program implementation.

HHS-related GitHub Accounts HHS-related GitHub Repositories HHS-related Developer Starter Tool Kit

HHS-related GitHub Accounts

This GitHub.io landing page is provided to raise awareness about GitHub activity across the Department and federal government such that developers do not need to be familiar with the government’s organizational structure in order to find :mag: health and human services related developer tools.

Included here are links to GitHub Accounts that are related to Department of Health & Human Services (HHS) operating divisions, staff offices, and programs.

Blue Button

Link to the Blue Button GitHub Account, supported by the Office of the National Coordinator ([ONC](http://www.healthit.gov)) for Health Information Technology (HIT)

Center for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS)

Link to the CMS GitHub Account

Food & Drug Administration (FDA)

Link to the FDA GitHub Account

HHS-related GitHub Repositories

Pillbox for Developers uses GitHub to enable anyone to join the process and help further development of the project. You can contribute to the project in by flagging errors or writing code to improve the process.

This space will be used to track development and enable open access to the data processing code. Future development will include improved data format outputs and great flexibility in data access. Access at github.com/HHS/pillbox-data-process.

CKANext data.json

Custom CKAN extension for hub.healthdata.gov

Healthcare Fraud Prevention Partnership

Software that supports a data exchange network for purposes of prevention and detection of fraud, waste and abuse across health insurance payers.

hhs.github.io

Jekyll code that runs this website.

Pillbox for Developers

Code that cleans up, or processes, source data for prescription, over-the-counter, homeopathic and veterinary oral solid dosage medications (pills) marketed in the United States. Produces an easy-to-use, "pill-focused" dataset.

Voice of Consumer (VOC)

The Voice of Consumer (VOC) tool is a key component of the HHS website performance measurement framework.

New to health and human services? Check out some developer resources to get you started.
